languages.text: "Милость Императора? К чему мне даровать вам милость того, кто не смог защитить вас от обмана? Того, кто обрек вас гнить среди ксеносов и предателей? Нет, Император вас отсюда не вытащит. А вот я могу... если хорошо попросите. На колени!"

traits.locale_text: "Милость Императора? К чему мне даровать вам милость того, кто не смог защитить вас от обмана? Того, кто обрек вас гнить среди ксеносов и предателей? Нет, Император вас отсюда не вытащит. А вот я могу... если хорошо попросите. На колени!"

languages.text: "The Emperor's Peace? Why should I grant you the deliverance of the one who failed to protect you from deceit? The one who left you to rot among xenos and traitors? No, the Emperor will not get you out of here. But I will... if your pleas convince me. Kneel!"
languages.original_text: "Милость Императора? К чему мне даровать вам милость того, кто не смог защитить вас от обмана? Того, кто обрек вас гнить среди ксеносов и предателей? Нет, Император вас отсюда не вытащит. А вот я могу... если хорошо попросите. На колени!"

traits.locale_text: "The Emperor's Grace? Why should I grant you the grace of the one who failed to protect you from deceit? The one who left you to rot among xenos and traitors? No, the Emperor will not get you out of here. But I can... if your pleas convince me. Kneel!"

"The Emperor's Grace? Why should I grant you the grace of the one who failed to protect you from deceit? The one who left you to rot among xenos and traitors? No, the Emperor will not get you out of here. But I can... if your pleas convince me. Kneel!"

"The Emperor's Peace? Why should I grant you the deliverance of the one who failed to protect you from deceit? The one who left you to rot among xenos and traitors? No, the Emperor will not get you out of here. But I can... if your pleas convince me. Kneel!"

"The Emperor's Peace? Why should I grant you the deliverance of the one who failed to protect you from deceit? The one who left you to rot among xenos and traitors? No, the Emperor will not get you out of here. But I can... if your pleas convince me. Kneel!"

"The Emperor's Peace? Why should I grant you the deliverance of the one who failed to protect you from deceit? The one who left you to rot among xenos and traitors? No, the Emperor will not get you out of here. But I will... if your pleas convince me. Kneel!"

"The Emperor's Peace? Why should I grant you the deliverance of the one who failed to protect you from deceit? The one who left you to rot among xenos and traitors? No, the Emperor will not get you out of here. But I will... if your pleas convince me. Kneel!"

languages.text: 「皇帝陛下の安寧だと？お前を欺瞞から守り切ることのできなかった者に、なぜ私が救いを与えねばならないのだ？お前を見放し、異種族と裏切り者の間で腐らせた者を？いや、皇帝はここから出してはくださらないだろう。だが私ならできる…泣きすがり、私を納得させてみろ。ひざまずけ！」
languages.original_text: "The Emperor's Peace? Why should I grant you the deliverance of the one who failed to protect you from deceit? The one who left you to rot among xenos and traitors? No, the Emperor will not get you out of here. But I will... if your pleas convince me. Kneel!"

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝陛下の安寧だと？お前を欺瞞から守り切ることのできなかった者に、なぜ私が救いを与えねばならないのだ？お前を見放し、異種族と裏切り者の間で腐らせた者を？いや、皇帝はここから出してはくださらないだろう。だが私ならできる…泣きすがり、私を納得させてみろ。ひざまずけ！」

languages.text: “帝皇安息？那个人欺骗了你们，任由你们死在异形与叛徒面前。可你们这些人甚至连他的骗局都看不清，我凭什么要赐予你们解脱？不，帝皇是不会拯救你们的，但我能救你们……只要你们的乞求能传到我的耳中。在我面前跪下吧！”
languages.original_text: "The Emperor's Peace? Why should I grant you the deliverance of the one who failed to protect you from deceit? The one who left you to rot among xenos and traitors? No, the Emperor will not get you out of here. But I will... if your pleas convince me. Kneel!"

traits.locale_text: “帝皇安息？那个人欺骗了你们，任由你们死在异形与叛徒面前。可你们这些人甚至连他的骗局都看不清，我凭什么要赐予你们解脱？不，帝皇是不会拯救你们的，但我能救你们……只要你们的乞求能传到我的耳中。在我面前跪下吧！”

languages.text: «¿La Paz del Emperador? ¿Por qué debería concederles la liberación en nombre de aquel que no les protegió del engaño? El que dejó que se pudrieran entre xenos y traidores. No, el Emperador no les sacará de aquí. Pero yo puedo... si sus súplicas me convencen. ¡Arrodíllense!».
languages.original_text: "The Emperor's Peace? Why should I grant you the deliverance of the one who failed to protect you from deceit? The one who left you to rot among xenos and traitors? No, the Emperor will not get you out of here. But I will... if your pleas convince me. Kneel!"

traits.locale_text: «¿La Paz del Emperador? ¿Por qué debería concederles la liberación de aquel que no les protegió del engaño? El que dejó que se pudrieran entre xenos y traidores. No, el Emperador no les sacará de aquí. Pero yo puedo... si sus súplicas me convencen. ¡Arrodíllense!».

languages.text: "Der Friede des Imperators? Warum sollte ich Euch die Erlösung dessen schenken, der Euch nicht vor der Täuschung geschützt hat? Der Euch zwischen Xenos und Verrätern verrotten lassen wollte? Nein, der Imperator wird Euch hier nicht rausholen. Aber ich ... wenn Euer Flehen mich überzeugt. Kniet nieder!"
languages.original_text: "The Emperor's Peace? Why should I grant you the deliverance of the one who failed to protect you from deceit? The one who left you to rot among xenos and traitors? No, the Emperor will not get you out of here. But I will... if your pleas convince me. Kneel!"

traits.locale_text: "Der Friede des Imperators? Warum sollte ich Euch die Erlösung dessen schenken, der Euch nicht vor der Täuschung geschützt hat? Der Euch zwischen Xenos und Verrätern verrotten lassen wollte? Nein, der Imperator wird Euch hier nicht rausholen. Aber ich kann es ... wenn Euer Flehen mich überzeugt. Kniet nieder!"

languages.text: « La paix de l'Empereur ? Pourquoi vous offrir la délivrance de celui qui n'a pas su vous protéger d'une si abominable supercherie et qui vous a laissés moisir ici, entourés de xénos et de traîtres ? Non, l'Empereur ne vous aidera pas à vous en sortir. Par contre, moi, je le peux... si vous parvenez à me convaincre. À genoux ! »
languages.original_text: "The Emperor's Peace? Why should I grant you the deliverance of the one who failed to protect you from deceit? The one who left you to rot among xenos and traitors? No, the Emperor will not get you out of here. But I will... if your pleas convince me. Kneel!"

traits.locale_text: « La paix de l'Empereur ? Pourquoi vous offrir la délivrance de celui qui n'a pas su vous protéger d'une si abominable supercherie et qui vous a laissé moisir ici, entourés de xénos et de traîtres ? Non, l'Empereur ne vous aidera pas à vous en sortir. Par contre, moi, je peux... si vous parvenez à me convaincre. À genoux ! »

languages.text: "İmparator'un Huzuru mu? Sizi kandırılmaktan koruyamayan birisinin hükmünü bahşetmek niye? Sizi zenolarla hainlerin arasında çürüyün diye kaderinize terk eden, İmparator değil mi? Hayır. İmparator sizi buradan çıkarmayacak. Ancak yalvarıp beni ikna ederseniz ben çıkarırım. Diz çökün!"
languages.original_text: "The Emperor's Peace? Why should I grant you the deliverance of the one who failed to protect you from deceit? The one who left you to rot among xenos and traitors? No, the Emperor will not get you out of here. But I will... if your pleas convince me. Kneel!"

traits.locale_text: "İmparator'un Huzuru mu? Sizi kandırılmaktan koruyamayan birisinin hükmünü bahşetmek niye? Sizi zenolarla hainlerin arasında çürüyün diye kaderinize terk eden, İmparator değil mi? Hayır. İmparator sizi buradan çıkarmayacak. Ancak eğer yalvara yalvara beni ikna ederseniz ben sizi çıkaracağım. Diz çökün!"
